Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.GUI

Class JoinCreate_View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.ClientView
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.GUI.JoinCreate_View
public class JoinCreate_View extends ClientView
Class for the representation of the JoinCreate_View. It extends the ClientView class and manages the user interface for the Join/Create screen.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the JoinCreate_View. It sets the action for the create, join and toggle buttons: to create a game, join an existing game or toggle between the two.

    • setStyle

      private void setStyle()
      Sets the css style for the create, join and toggle buttons.

      Hide the join/create view and show the list of players.
      Parameters:
      joined - A boolean value that indicates if the player has joined the game.
